details:
This update for hawk2 fixes one security issue and one bug.

The following security change is included:

-  To prevent Clickjacking attacks, set Content-Security-Policy to frame-ancestors 'self' (bsc#984619)

The following non-security issue was fixed:

-  In the Wizards UI, prevent text display issues due to internationalization with certain strings (bsc#987696)

package.ecosystem: SUSE:Linux Enterprise High Availability Extension 12 SP1
package.name: hawk2
